pageContext.claim: “You know President Obama had a really big one [campaign finance violation] from 10 times more money -- much more money and you know what? He paid a fine.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is mixing apples and oranges here. The Obama campaign paid a fine for relatively minor reporting violations to the Federal Election Commission. The Obama campaign’s violation was a civil infraction of campaign finance law, which resulted in an administrative penalty. Cohen pleaded guilty to a deliberate effort to violate campaign finance law, which is a crime.
